page.title: 01Summary of the Area
page.content: It is predominantly an agricultural area mainly given over to the cultivation of crops and intensively managed grassland. What facilities there are can be found in{WOLVEY}village,which in the past ten years has become a popular residential area for people working in the surrounding towns.The population is now about 2,000. Wolvey is situated on the Leicestershire/Warwickshire border approximately 9 miles from Coventry and 15 miles from Leicester.It is reputed to be one of the most geographically central villages in England and is within 1/2 mile of the crossing ofthe Roman{FOSSE WAY}and Roman{WATLING STREET}.Most of the village is situated on rising ground below which flows the{RIVER ANKER}.
